nodes.text: The Balmorra Run was a smugglers' hyperlane that approached the Naboo system.

The hyperlane was named for its popularity with Balmorran spacers. The Kaliida Nebula was situated on it and was the nesting grounds of the neebray manta. Anakin Skywalker used it as a shortcut in 21 BBY to get his task force to the Malevolence. While en route to the Kaliida Shoals Medical Center, Shadow Squadron encountered the mantas; this happenstance led to the accidental damage of several fighters.
